ygData.subject: Re: Power Smithing (what I have learned so far)
ygData.msgSnippet: yes trivial at 41 i can t remember the cos but they are cheaper than skewers and i had a very good success rate meaning i could sell them back and use the same
ygData.messageBody:
yes trivial at 41

i can't remember the cos but they are cheaper than skewers and i had a very
good success rate meaning i could sell them back and use the same money
over and over, only lose money on failures
